page.title: 06The Sub-Warden, Glenalmond
page.content: The Sub-Warden's job in the College is to supervise functions, to liase between the Warden and masters and to stand in for the Warden when absent. {He believes that the boys in the {school have been pressured by big {business,advertising and the pop {culture.}The responsibility has been taken away from us and since we throw away our money, we are vulnerable to the money-makers. He believes the level of discipline in the community to have been kept to a reasonable standard but more response could be given to authority. The punishments for the breaking of rules, e.g. smoking or drinking, are not a sufficient deterrent.{Beating has been {phased out due to outside pressure.} The gullible attitude of the school has increased but the discipline has remained at the same level.
